translations.chinese: 今天下賢者智能豈特古之人乎？
translations.english: Now in the world, are worthy men and the wise inferior to ancient people?

translations.chinese: 患 在人主不交故也，士奚由進！
translations.english: The trouble is that rulers do not associate with them. How can scholars advance!

translations.chinese: 今吾以天之靈，賢士大夫定有天下，以為一家，欲其長久，世世奉宗廟亡絕也。
translations.english: Now I, by Heaven's blessing, together with worthy scholars and grand masters have pacified the world and made it one family. I desire it to last long, generation after generation serving the ancestral temples without end.

translations.chinese: 賢人已與我共平之矣，而不與吾共安利之，可乎？
translations.english: Worthy men have already helped me pacify it, but do not help me secure and benefit it. Is this acceptable?

translations.chinese: 賢士 大夫有肯從我游者，吾能尊顯之。
translations.english: Worthy scholars and grand masters who are willing to follow me, I can honor and make them eminent.
